Hi, I have DataGrid with column of buttons
 <Button Content="Start" Command="NavigationCommands.GoToPage" CommandParameter="/MyWindows/ExecuteTaskPage.xaml" Click="Execute_Click"/>
So, I need to refresh the page every time, but it is loaded only when the first transition
You can decorate your page with the ModernFrame.KeepAlive=false attached property so that your content is created each time it's requested. See also this discussion

Hi,

<Button Content="Start" Command="NavigationCommands.GoToPage" CommandParameter="/MyWindows/ExecuteTaskPage.xaml" Click="Execute_Click"/>
Any Hints please..
